attributes.action: Revise the current Laws/Rulings regarding posthumous knighthoods.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having received an email from the Prime Minister about the decision not to award Bob Paisley with a posthumous knighthood has left me feeling somewhat aggrieved. I ask the Prime Minister to look into the laws/rulings regarding Knighthoods and have the changed in order to be able to award a person a Knighthood posthumosuly.
